action-view.name: action-stock-move-line-product-reserved-planned
action-view.title: ${fullName} plan. st. move
action-view.domain: self.reservedQty > 0 and self.stockMove.statusSelect = 2 and (self.stockMove.fromStockLocation.typeSelect = 1 or self.stockMove.toStockLocation.typeSelect = 1) and self.product.id = :_id

action-view.name: action-stock-location-line-view-reserved-stock-move-lines
action-view.title: Reserved stock move lines
action-view.domain: self.reservedQty > 0 and self.stockMove.statusSelect = 2 AND self.product.id = :productId AND (self.stockMove.fromStockLocation.id = :locationId OR self.stockMove.toStockLocation.id = :locationId)
